name: Good Times Roll
description:
Match your bumpers to platforms to get extra points! Match six in a row to launch yourself upwards and gain even more points! Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam!

Please share your High Score!

CONTROLS

A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow : Move & Roll

FILES/DOWNLOAD

Just download, unzip, and launch GoodTimesRoll to let the good ti-.. you get it.

Download GoodTimesRoll7Win for standard play 

or

Download GoodTimesRoll7WinSymbols this adds symbols to the bumpers and platforms in case you don't want to rely on just color.

Credits

Game Designer : Micah Kearny (https://scaryredgorilla.itch.io/)

Music : Lamarr Family Values (@lamarrfv) [Recorded at No Seasons Studio]
